title: Big Boys: Books 5-8
description:
The Big Boys are back.


They’re bulky. They’re burly. These plus size heroes are here to sweep you off your feet.

The Big Boys: 5-9 box set includes four short and steamy instalove stories:


Big Bet

I’m a burlesque showgirl. I dance for crowds of thousands every night.But it’s only one man’s attention I crave.
Big Bratva

She’s dropped on my doorstep with a burlap sack on her head.The diplomat’s daughter. The one they’re all looking for.
Big Beast

He’s the city’s top chef. Famously strict, with a trademark scowl.I’m the waitress who just ruined his night.
Big Brain

It’s the trip of a lifetime–ruined castles and ancient battlefields.But I can’t stop longing for my burly professor.
author: Cassie Mint
